short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Go-To Unit Converter - Get Instant Results on Chrome and be able to search using Microsoft Bing search engine

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert Units with Ease - Say goodbye to manual conversions.
Unit Conversion Made Simple With Our Chrome Extension. Say goodbye to manual conversions and use our extension to quickly and easily convert different units like kg to libra and much more directly from your browser.

Our Chrome extension is a must-have tool for anyone who needs to frequently convert units while browsing the web. With our extension, you can convert a wide variety of units, including length, weight, volume, temperature, and more, all from the comfort of your browser.

The conversion tool is incredibly easy to use. Simply enter the value you want to convert and select the units you want to convert from and to. Our extension will automatically calculate the conversion and display the result, saving you time and effort.

In addition to the ability to convert units, the extension also includes a search function that uses the Microsoft Bing search engine. This allows users to quickly search for information on the internet without having to open a separate tab or window.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Password Generator Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use -  https://theunitconvertor.com/terms
and Privacy Policy - https://theunitconvertor.com/privacy.
